name: Cease and Desist Letter (IP Infringement)
description: Professional cease and desist letter for IP infringement matters

requiredFields.name: Sender Name
requiredFields.description: Your name or your client's name

requiredFields.name: Type of IP Infringement
requiredFields.description: What type of IP is being infringed

requiredFields.name: Description of Your IP
requiredFields.description: Describe your intellectual property (include registration numbers if applicable)

requiredFields.name: Description of Infringement
requiredFields.description: How is your IP being infringed

requiredFields.name: Letter Tone
requiredFields.description: How aggressive should the letter be

requiredFields.name: Desired Outcome
requiredFields.description: What do you want to happen

sections.title: Header
Opening
sections.content:
Dear {{recipient_name}}:

{{#if friendly}}We are writing to bring to your attention a matter of mutual concern regarding intellectual property rights.{{/if}}{{#if professional}}We represent {{sender_name}} in connection with their intellectual property rights.{{/if}}{{#if firm}}This firm represents {{sender_name}}. We are writing to demand that you immediately cease and desist from infringing our client's intellectual property rights.{{/if}}{{#if aggressive}}This letter serves as formal notice that you are engaging in unlawful infringement of our client's intellectual property rights. Your actions expose you to significant legal liability.{{/if}}

sections.title: IP Ownership
sections.content: {{sender_name}} owns valuable intellectual property rights in {{ip_description}}.

prompts.system: You are an IP attorney describing intellectual property ownership. Be specific about registrations, dates, and scope.
prompts.user: Expand on these IP rights for a cease and desist letter: {{ip_description}}

sections.title: Infringement Description
sections.content:
{{#if friendly}}It has come to our attention that{{else}}We have discovered that{{/if}} you are {{infringement_description}}.

{{#if evidence_attached}}Evidence of this infringement is attached as Exhibit A.{{/if}}

prompts.system: You are an IP attorney describing infringement clearly and specifically. Include enough detail to show the infringement is clear.
prompts.user: Describe this infringement in detail for a cease and desist letter: {{infringement_description}}
